title: Legal Education in the IR4.0 Era: Knowledge Reconstruction for Digital Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Design and implementation of legal education utilizing IR4.0 technologies in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the impact of IR4.0 technologies (AI, data analytics, etc.) on the legal field.
Learners can design new legal principles and ethical frameworks required in the digital age.
Learners can conduct legal case studies and project-based learning related to IR4.0 using online collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
